trans-unit.source: Represents the run-time behavior of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer"></xref>.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> enables the control of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> properties.
Some of these properties can be set only using the constructor of the class.

In that case, the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> can be replaced using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.CreateSerializer%2A> method.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md).

[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> to replace the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate> returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.DataContractSurrogate%2A> property, see [Data Contract Surrogates](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior"></xref> class with the specified operation description.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> that represents the operation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior"></xref> class with the specified operation description and data contract format.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> that represents the operation.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute"></xref> that is used to control the serialization process.
Creates an instance of a class that inherits from <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref> for serialization and deserialization processes.

Both the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> class.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to create the serializer for.
The name of the generated type.
The namespace of the generated type.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IList`1"></xref> of <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that contains known types.
An instance of a class that inherits from the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref> class.

Creates an instance of a class that inherits from <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref> for serialization and deserialization processes with an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString"></xref> that contains the namespace.

Both the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> class.
The type to serialize or deserialize.
The name of the serialized type.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString"></xref> that contains the namespace of the serialized type.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IList`1"></xref> of <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that contains known types.
An instance of a class that inherits from the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute"></xref> associated with the operation.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute"></xref> associated with the operation.
Gets or sets an implementation of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver"></xref> that is used to dynamically map types during serialization and deserialization processes.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver> class document.
Type: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver"></xref>
A class that maps an `xsi:type` to a known data contract type.
Gets or sets a surrogate to be used during the serialization and deserialization processes.
An <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"></xref> that is used as a substitute serializer.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the data provided by an extension of a type (and therefore not in the data contract) is ignored or not.
When set to `true`, the extra data is returned with any other serialized data.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject> interface.
`true` to ignore the data; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the object graph to serialize or deserialize.
The maximum number of items in the object graph to serialize or deserialize.
The default is <xref href="System.Int32.MaxValue"></xref>.
Adds a collection of parameters to the behavior.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> to add the parameters to.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection"></xref> that contains the parameters to add.
Attaches a client behavior to the operation.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> that represents the operation.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation"></xref> that represents a client.
Applies the behavior to the operation.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> that represents the operation.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation"></xref> to attach the behavior to.
Validates the operation.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> that represents the operation to validate.
Exports the WSDL representation of the operation.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> to use for the export.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> for the WSDL.
Exports the endpoint description as a WSDL document.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> to use for the export.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext"></xref> for the WSDL.
